# {{title}} ## : {{description}} HTML h1 BeautifulSoup ```python # from bs4 import BeautifulSoup # HTML html = """ Example Page

Hello, World!

""" # BeautifulSoup lxml soup = BeautifulSoup(html, 'lxml') # h1 h1 = soup.find('h1') print(h1.text) ``` HTML BeautifulSoup [lxml](https://so.csdn.net/so/search?q=lxml&spm=1001.2101.3001.7020) HTML `find` h1 `text` "Hello, World!" `find` `find_all``select` BeautifulSoup `name``string``attrs` ## BeautifulSoup pip ```cobol pip install beautifulsoup4 AI ``` ### BeautifulSoup HTML XML BeautifulSoup #### ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup # HTML XML html_doc = 'Example Page

This is a paragraph.

' soup = BeautifulSoup(html_doc, 'html.parser') ``` `html_doc` `BeautifulSoup` BeautifulSoup `soup` html.parser HTML XML #### ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup # HTML XML with open('example.html', 'r') as f: soup = BeautifulSoup(f, 'html.parser') ``` `open` `example.html` `BeautifulSoup` BeautifulSoup `soup` html.parser HTML XML #### HTML `example.html` ```html Example Page

Hello, World!

This is the first paragraph.

This is the second paragraph.

Go to Example Website ``` BeautifulSoup `soup` `title` ```python print(soup.title)# Example Page ``` `text` `string` ```python print(soup.h1.text)# Hello, World! print(soup.h1.string)# Hello, World! ``` `attrs` ```python print(soup.a.attrs['href']) # https://www.example.com ``` `find_all` ```python # p ps = soup.find_all('p') for p in ps: print(p.text) # This is the first paragraph. # This is the second paragraph. # class "second" p p = soup.find('p', {'class': 'second'}) print(p.text) # This is the second paragraph. ``` `parent` `parents` ```python p = soup.find('p', {'class': 'first'}) print(p.parent.name) # body for parent in p.parents: print(parent.name) # p # body # html # [document] ``` ## BeautifulSoup - CSS - XML - script style - #### CSS BeautifulSoup CSS `select` class "second" p ````python p = soup.select_one('p.second') print(p.text ```python p = soup.select_one('p.second') print(p.text) # This is the second paragraph. ```` `select_one` CSS `p.second` class "second" p `select` ```python ps = soup.select('p') for p in ps: print(p.text) # This is the first paragraph. # This is the second paragraph. ps = soup.select('p.first') for p in ps: print(p.text) # This is the first paragraph. ``` #### XML HTML BeautifulSoup XML 'xml' ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup xml_doc = """ Item 1 10.00 Item 2 20.00 """ soup = BeautifulSoup(xml_doc, 'xml') items = soup.find_all('item') for item in items: name = item.find('name').text price = item.find('price').text print(f'{name}: {price}') ``` 'xml' [find_all](https://so.csdn.net/so/search?q=find_all&spm=1001.2101.3001.7020) find #### script style JavaScript CSS `text` JavaScript CSS BeautifulSoup `string` `get_text` JavaScript CSS ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup html_doc = """

Hello, World!

This is a paragraph.

""" soup = BeautifulSoup(html_doc, 'html.parser') # style style = soup.find('style').string print(style) # p { color: red; } # script JavaScript script = soup.find('script').get_text() print(script) # nttalert('Hello, World!');n ``` `string` `get_text` style script ## BeautifulSoup BeautifulSoup HTML XML Python ## requests requests Content-Type chardet ## ``` import requests url = 'https://cn.bing.com/' response = requests.get(url) # chardet import chardet encoding = chardet.detect(response.content)['encoding'] print(encoding) response.encoding = encoding utf-8 utf-8 gbk response.encoding: response.encoding = 'utf-8' # 'gbk' ``` ### BeautifulSoup find() find_all() - `find()` - `find_all()` ## ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import requests # url = 'https://www.baidu.com/' # bing # HTTP response = requests.get(url) # response.encoding = 'utf-8' soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'lxml') # first_link = soup.find('a') print(first_link) print("----------------------------") # href first_link_url = first_link.get('href') print(first_link_url) print("----------------------------") # all_links = soup.find_all('a') print(all_links) ---------------------------- http://news.baidu.com ---------------------------- [, hao123, , , ``` ### get_text() ## ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import requests # url = 'https://www.baidu.com/' # bing # HTTP response = requests.get(url) # response.encoding = 'utf-8' soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'lxml') #

paragraph_text = soup.find('p').get_text() # all_text = soup.get_text() print(all_text) ... ``` ### parent children ``` # parent_tag = first_link.parent # children = first_link.children ``` ## ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import requests # url = 'https://www.baidu.com/' # bing # HTTP response = requests.get(url) # response.encoding = 'utf-8' soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'lxml') # first_link = soup.find('a') print(first_link) print("----------------------------") # parent_tag = first_link.parent print(parent_tag.get_text()) ---------------------------- hao123 ``` ### example-class div ``` # class="example-class"

divs_with_class = soup.find_all('div', class_='example-class') # id="unique-id"

unique_paragraph = soup.find('p', id='unique-id') ``` id su ![](https://www.runoob.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/2d889eb3-9562-45d6-9688-f7250252d3a8.png) ## ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import requests # url = 'https://www.baidu.com/' # bing # HTTP response = requests.get(url) # response.encoding = 'utf-8' soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'lxml') # id="unique-id" unique_input = soup.find('input', id='su') input_value = unique_input['value'] # input print(input_value) ``` --- ## ### CSS BeautifulSoup CSS select() jQuery ``` # CSS class 'example'

example_divs = soup.select('div.example') # href links = soup.select('a[href]') ``` ### BeautifulSoup HTML ``` #
nested_divs = soup.find_all('div', class_='nested') for div in nested_divs: print(div.get_text()) ``` ### BeautifulSoup HTML ## ```python # href first_link['href'] = 'http://new-url.com' #

first_paragraph = soup.find('p') first_paragraph.string = 'Updated content' # first_paragraph.decompose() ``` ### BeautifulSoup HTML ``` # html_str = str(soup) ``` --- ## BeautifulSoup BeautifulSoup : BeautifulSoup | `soup = BeautifulSoup(html_doc, 'html.parser')` | | `.prettify()` | | `print(soup.prettify())` | | `.find()` | | `tag = soup.find('a')` | | `.find_all()` | | `tags = soup.find_all('a')` | | `.find_all_next()` | | `tags = soup.find('div').find_all_next('p')` | | `.find_all_previous()` | | `tags = soup.find('div').find_all_previous('p')` | | `.find_parent()` | | tag.previous_sibling` | | `.get_text()` | HTML | `text = tag.get_text()` | | `.attrs` | | `href = tag.attrs['href']` | | `.string` | | `string_content = tag.string` | | `.name` | | `tag_name = tag.name` | | `.contents` | | `children = tag.contents` | | `.descendants` | | `for child in tag.descendants: print(child)` | | `.parent` | | `parent = tag.parent` | | `.previous_element` | | `prev_elem = tag.previous_element` | | `.next_element` | | `next_elem = tag.next_element` | | `.decompose()` | | `tag.decompose()` | | `.unwrap()` | | `tag.unwrap()` | | `.insert()` | | `tag.insert(0, new_tag)` | | `.insert_before()` | | `tag.insert_before(new_tag)` | | `.insert_after()` | | `tag.insert_after(new_tag)` | | `.extract()` | | `extracted_tag = tag.extract()` | | `.replace_with()` | | `tag.replace_with(new_tag)` | | `.has_attr()` | | `if tag.has_attr('href'):` | | `.get()` | | `href = tag.get('href')` | | `.clear()` | | `tag.clear()` | | `.encode()` | | `encoded = tag.encode()` | | ``` | `if tag.is_empty_element:` | | `.is_ancestor_of()` | | `if tag.is_ancestor_of(another_tag):` | | `.is_descendant_of()` | | `if tag.is_descendant_of(another_tag):` | ### | **/** | **** | **** | | ------------- | ---------------------------------------- | --------------------------- | | `.style` | | `style = tag['style']` | | `.id` | `id` | `id = tag['id']` | | `.class_` | `class` | `class_name = tag['class']` | | `.string` | | `content = tag.string` | | `.parent` | | `parent = tag.parent` | ### | **/** | **** | **** | | ------------------ | -------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | | `find_all(string)` | | `tag = soup.find_all('div', class_='container')` | | `find_all(id)` | `id` | `tag = soup.find_all(id='main')` | | `find_all(attrs)` | | `tag = soup.find_all(attrs={"href": "http://example.com"})` |

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

xml_doc =
"""
<root>
  <item>
    <name>Item 1</name>
    <price>10.00</price>
  </item>
  <item>
    <name>Item 2</name>
    <price>20.00</price>
  </item>
</root>
"""

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

xml_doc =
"""
<root>
  <item>
    <name>Item 1</name>
    <price>10.00</price>
  </item>
  <item>
    <name>Item 2</name>
    <price>20.00</price>
  </item>
</root>
"""

soup = BeautifulSoup(xml_doc, 'xml')

items = soup.find_all('item')

    price = item.find('price').text
    print(f'{name}: {price}')

```python
import scrapy
from ..items import ScrapyQuotesItem


class QuotesSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = "quotes"
    allowed_domains = ["quotes.toscrape.com"]
    start_urls = ["https://quotes.toscrape.com"]

    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        quotes = response.css("div.quote")
        for quote in quotes:
            item = ScrapyQuotesItem()
            item["text"] = quote.css("span.text::text").extract_first("")
            item["author"] = quote.css("small.author::text").extract_first("")
            item["tags"] = quote.css("div.tags a.tag::text").extract()
            yield item
        href = response.css("li.next a::attr(href)").extract_first("")
        next_url = response.urljoin(href)
        yield scrapy.Request(url=next_url, callback=self.parse)
1234567891011121314151617181920AI
```

```python
class TextPipeline(object):
    def __init__(self):
        self.limit = 50

    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        if item["text"]:
            if len(item["text"]) > self.limit:
                item["text"] = item["text"][:self.limit].rstrip() + "..."
            return item
        else:
            return DropItem("Missing Text")
```

```python
class MongoPipeline(object):
    def __init__(self, connection_string, database):
        self.connection_string = connection_string
        self.database = database

    @classmethod
    def from_crawler(cls, crawler):
        return cls(
            connection_string=crawler.settings.get('MONGODB_CONNECTION_STRING'),
            database=crawler.settings.get('MONGODB_DATABASE')
        )

    def open_spider(self, spider):
        self.client = pymongo.MongoClient(self.connection_string)
        self.db = self.client[self.database]

    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        name = item.__class__.__name__
        self.db[name].insert_one(dict(item))
        return item

    def close_spider(self, spider):
        self.client.close()
```

```python
import scrapy
```
```python
from ..items import ScrapyQuotesItem


class QuotesSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = "quotes"
    allowed_domains = ["quotes.toscrape.com"]
    start_urls = ["https://quotes.toscrape.com"]

    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        quotes = response.css("div.quote")
        for quote in quotes:
            item = ScrapyQuotesItem()
            item["text"] = quote.css("span.text::text").extract_first("")
            item["author"] = quote.css("small.author::text").extract_first("")
            item["tags"] = quote.css("div.tags a.tag::text").extract()
            yield item
```
```python
        href = response.css("li.next a::attr(href)").extract_first("")
        next_url = response.urljoin(href)
        yield scrapy.Request(url=next_url, callback=self.parse)
```

```python
    def __init__(self):
        self.limit = 50

    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        if item["text"]:
            if len(item["text"]) > self.limit:
                item["text"] = item["text"][:self.limit].rstrip() + "..."
            return item
        else:
            return DropItem("Missing Text")
```

```python
class MongoPipeline(object):
    def __init__(self, connection_string, database):
        self.connection_string = connection_string
        self.database = database

    @classmethod
    def from_crawler(cls, crawler):
        return cls(
            connection_string=crawler.settings.get('MONGODB_CONNECTION_STRING'),
            database=crawler.settings.get('MONGODB_DATABASE')
        )

    def open_spider(self, spider):
        self.client = pymongo.MongoClient(self.connection_string)
        self.db = self.client[self.database]

    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        name = item.__class__.__name__
        self.db[name].insert_one(dict(item))
        return item

    def close_spider(self, spider):
        self.client.close()
```

        href = response.css("li.next a::attr(href)").extract_first("")
        next_url = response.urljoin(href)
        yield scrapy.Request(url=next_url, callback=self.parse)

python
class MongoPipeline(object):
    def __init__(self, connection_string, database):
        self.connection_string = connection_string
        self.database = database

    @classmethod
    def from_crawler(cls, crawler):
        return cls(
            connection_string=crawler.settings.get('MONGODB_CONNECTION_STRING'),
            database=crawler.settings.get('MONGODB_DATABASE')
        )

    def open_spider(self, spider):
        self.client = pymongo.MongoClient(self.connection_string)
        self.db = self.client[self.database]

    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        name = item.__class__.__name__
        self.db[name].insert_one(dict(item))
        return item

    def close_spider(self, spider):
        self.client.close()

java
@Configuration
public class RedisConfig {
    @Bean
    public RedisTemplate<String, Object> redisTemplate(RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory)
            throws UnknownHostException {
        // 
        RedisTemplate<String, Object> redisTemplate = new RedisTemplate<>();
        // 
        redisTemplate.setConnectionFactory(redisConnectionFactory);
        // 
        GenericJackson2JsonRedisSerializer jsonRedisSerializer =
                new GenericJackson2JsonRedisSerializer();
        // key hashKey string
        redisTemplate.setKeySerializer(RedisSerializer.string());
        redisTemplate.setHashKeySerializer(RedisSerializer.string());
        // value hashValue JSON
        redisTemplate.setValueSerializer(jsonRedisSerializer);
        redisTemplate.setHashValueSerializer(jsonRedisSerializer);
        return redisTemplate;
    }
}

String-

java
package com.tensquare.article;

import com.tensquare.article.pojo.User;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;
import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate;
import org.springframework.test.context.junit4.SpringJUnit4ClassRunner;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;

@SpringBootTest
@RunWith(SpringJUnit4ClassRunner.class)
public class RedisTemTest {
    @Autowired
    private RedisTemplate redisTemplate;

    /*
     * String
     * */
    @Test
    public void StringDataTest() {
        // User ,String, Serializable 
        User user = new User("1", "Tom", "", 15);

        // 
        redisTemplate.opsForValue().set("user", user);

        // 30s, (30, TimeUnit.SECONDS) ,
        redisTemplate.opsForValue().set("user1", "Rose", 30, TimeUnit.SECONDS);

        // keyvalue
        User value = (User) redisTemplate.opsForValue().get("user");

        // 
        Long size = redisTemplate.opsForValue().size("user1");

        // 
        redisTemplate.delete("user1");
    }
}

Set-

java
 /*
     * Set CURD
     * */
    @Test
    public void SetDataTest() {
        User user = new User("1", "Tom", "", 15);
        User user1 = new User("2", "Jack", "", 17);
        User user2 = new User("3", "Rose", "", 18);
        User user3 = new User("4", "Jerry", "", 19);

        //  keyuser_1user
        redisTemplate.opsForSet().add("user_1", user);
        redisTemplate.opsForSet().add("user_1", user1);

        //   user_1 5 
        redisTemplate.expire("user_1", 5, TimeUnit.SECONDS);

        //  user_1  value
        Set user1_list = redisTemplate.opsForSet().members("user_1");
        //  user_1  user 
        Boolean result = redisTemplate.opsForSet().isMember("user_1", user);

        //  user_1  user ,
        Long success_count = redisTemplate.opsForSet().remove("user_1", user);
        //  user_1 
        Object user_1 = redisTemplate.opsForSet().pop("user_1");

        //    
        redisTemplate.opsForSet().add("names1", user, user1, user2);
        redisTemplate.opsForSet().add("names2", user, user1, user3);
        //
        Set<User> intersect = redisTemplate.opsForSet().intersect("names1", "names2");
        for (User u1 : intersect) {
            System.out.println(": " + u1);
        }
        //
        Set<User> union = redisTemplate.opsForSet().union("names1", "names2");
        for (User u2 : union) {
            System.out.println(": " + u2);
        }
        //[]
        Set<User> difference = redisTemplate.opsForSet().difference("names1", "names2");
        for (User u3 : difference) {
            System.out.println(": " + u3);
        }
    }

        return redisTemplate.getExpire(key, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
    }
    /**

     * @return
     */

        return redisTemplate.hasKey(key);
    }
    /**
     * key

     * @return
     */
    public boolean persist(String key) {
        return redisTemplate.boundValueOps(key).persist();

    //- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  String - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

            redisTemplate.opsForValue().set(key, value);
        }

java
@Configuration
public class RedisConfig {
    @Bean
    public RedisTemplate<String, Object> redisTemplate(RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory)
            throws UnknownHostException {
        // 
        RedisTemplate<String, Object> redisTemplate = new RedisTemplate<>();
        // 
        redisTemplate.setConnectionFactory(redisConnectionFactory);
        // 
        GenericJackson2JsonRedisSerializer jsonRedisSerializer =
                new GenericJackson2JsonRedisSerializer();
        // key hashKey string
        redisTemplate.setKeySerializer(RedisSerializer.string());
        redisTemplate.setHashKeySerializer(RedisSerializer.string());
        // value hashValue JSON
        redisTemplate.setValueSerializer(jsonRedisSerializer);
        redisTemplate.setHashValueSerializer(jsonRedisSerializer);
        return redisTemplate;
    }
}

<template>
  <div>{{ count }}</div>

     1
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {  
      count: 1,
      anotherCount: 0,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    onClick() {
      this.count += 1;
    },
  },
  watch: {
    count(newValue) {
      this.anotherCount = newValue - 1;
    },
  },
}
</script>

const count = ref(1);
const onClick = () => {
  count.value += 1;
};

const anotherCount = ref(0);

// 
// 
//  count 
watch(count, (newValue) => {
  anotherCount.value = newValue - 1;
})

</script>

txt
import {defineStore} from 'pinia'
const useAgeStore = defineStore('use', {
    state:()=>{//state  data 
        return {}
    },
    getters: {//getters  computed
        getAge: (state) => {
            return state.age
        }
    },
    actions: {//actions  methods
        setAge(age) {
            this.age = age
        }
    }
})

#define MaxSize 10				//
typedef struct{
    ElemType data[MaxSize];		//
    int top;					//
}SqStack;						//Sq:sequence

bool bracketCheck(char str[],int length){
    SqStack S;
    InitStack(S);				//
    for(int i=0;i<length;i++){
        if(str[i]=='(' || str[i]=='[' || str[i]=='{'){
            Push(S,str[i]);		//
        }else{
            if(StackEmpty(S))	return false;
            //
            char topElem;
            Pop(S,topElem);		//
            if(str[i]==')' && topElem!='(')
                return false;
            if(str[i]==']' && topElem!='[')
                return false;
            if(str[i]=='}' && topElem!='{')
                return false;
        }
    }
    return StackEmpty(S);		//
}

c
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ctype.h>

typedef struct stack_t stack_t, *pstack_t, snode_t, *psnode_t;
struct stack_t { psnode_t next; int v; };


stack_t STACK(void);                //
int isempty (pstack_t stack);       //
int  top    (pstack_t stack);       //
int  pop    (pstack_t stack);       //
void push   (pstack_t stack, int v);//

int main(void)
{
    stack_t opnds = STACK();
    int operand, a, b;
    char input[32];

    while (scanf("%s", input) != EOF) {
        if (sscanf(input, "%d", &operand)) {
            push(&opnds, operand);
        } else {
            b = pop(&opnds);
            a = pop(&opnds);
            switch (input[0]) {
            case '+': push(&opnds, a + b); break;
            case '-': push(&opnds, a - b); break;
            case '*': push(&opnds, a * b); break;
            case '/': push(&opnds, a / b); break;
            }
        }
    }
    printf("%d", pop(&opnds));
    return 0;
}

stack_t STACK(void) { return (stack_t){ NULL }; }
int isempty (pstack_t stack) { return stack->next == NULL; }
int  top    (pstack_t stack) { return isempty(stack) ? -1 : stack->next->v; }
int  pop    (pstack_t stack) {
    if (isempty(stack)) return -1;
    psnode_t  p = stack->next;
    int       v = p->v;
    stack->next = p->next;
    free(p);
    return v;
}
void push   (pstack_t stack, int v) {
    psnode_t p = (psnode_t)malloc(sizeof(snode_t));
    p->v    = v;
    p->next = stack->next;
    stack->next = p;
}

        return 0;

typedef struct{
    ElemType data[MaxSize];		//
    int top;					//
}SqStack;						//Sq:sequence

bool bracketCheck(char str[],int length){
    SqStack S;
    InitStack(S);				//
    for(int i=0;i<length;i++){
        if(str[i]=='(' || str[i]=='[' || str[i]=='{'){
            Push(S,str[i]);		//
        }else{
            if(StackEmpty(S))	return false;
            //
            char topElem;
            Pop(S,topElem);		//
            if(str[i]==')' && topElem!='(')
                return false;
            if(str[i]==']' && topElem!='[')
                return false;
            if(str[i]=='}' && topElem!='{')
                return false;
        }
    }
    return StackEmpty(S);		//
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ctype.h>

typedef struct stack_t stack_t, *pstack_t, snode_t, *psnode_t;
struct stack_t { psnode_t next; int v; };


stack_t STACK(void);                //
int isempty (pstack_t stack);       //
int  top    (pstack_t stack);       //
int  pop    (pstack_t stack);       //
void push   (pstack_t stack, int v);//

int main(void)
{
    stack_t opnds = STACK();
    int operand, a, b;
    char input[32];

    while (scanf("%s", input) != EOF) {
        if (sscanf(input, "%d", &operand)) {
            push(&opnds, operand);
        } else {
            b = pop(&opnds);
            a = pop(&opnds);
            switch (input[0]) {
            case '+': push(&opnds, a + b); break;
            case '-': push(&opnds, a - b); break;
            case '*': push(&opnds, a * b); break;
            case '/': push(&opnds, a / b); break;
            }
        }
    }
    printf("%d", pop(&opnds));
    return 0;
}

stack_t STACK(void) { return (stack_t){ NULL }; }
int isempty (pstack_t stack) { return stack->next == NULL; }
int  top    (pstack_t stack) { return isempty(stack) ? -1 : stack->next->v; }
int  pop    (pstack_t stack) {
    if (isempty(stack)) return -1;
    psnode_t  p = stack->next;
    int       v = p->v;
    stack->next = p->next;
    free(p);
    return v;
}
void push   (pstack_t stack, int v) {
    psnode_t p = (psnode_t)malloc(sizeof(snode_t));
    p->v    = v;
    p->next = stack->next;
    stack->next = p;
}

bool DeQueue(LinkQueue &QElemType &x){
    if(Q.front==Q.rear)	return false;
    LinkNode *p=Q.front->next;
    x=p->data;				//x
    Q.front->next=p->next;	//next
    if(Q.rear==p)			//
        Q.rear=Q.front;		//rear
    free(p);				//
    return true;
}

bool SubString(SString &Sub,SString S,int pos,int len){
    if(pos+len-1 > S.length)
        return false;	//
    for(int i=pos;i<pos+len;i++)
        Sub.ch[i-pos+1] = S.ch[i];
    Sub.length = len;
    return true;
}

int StrCompare(SString S,SString T){
    for(int i=1;i<=S.length && i<=T.length;i++){
        if(S.ch[i]!=T.ch[i])
            return S.ch[i]-T.ch[i];
    }
    return S.length-T.length;
    //
}

void PreOrder(BiTree T){
    if(T!=NULL){
        visit(T);		//visit
        PreOrder(T->lchild);	//
        PreOrder(T->rchild);	//
    }
}

cpp
int treeDepth(BiTree T){
    if(T == NULL){
        return 0;
    }
    else{
        int l = treeDepth(T->lchild);
        int r = treeDepth(T->rchild);
        //=Max()+1 
        return l>r? l+1:r+1;
    }
}
